response.summary:
Electrical Engineer with master degree in Industrial Automation, both titles at “Universidad Nacional de Colombia”. Project Management specialist at “Universidad EAN de Colombia”.

Solid statistical and business knowledge with experience in analysis and decision-making aimed at obtaining results. I have participated in different projects applying methodologies and frameworks based on agility in both public and private sector.

My main objective is to grow every day in the personal and professional field. Proactive, with initiative and leadership projection, ability to assume technical and administrative responsibilities, continuous
learning skills and teamwork.
response.skills: Team Leadership, Discipleship, Integrity Management, Continuous Improvement, Research, Leadership, Management, Customer Service, Project Management, Microsoft Office, Project Planning, Team Building, Public Speaking, Training, Agile Methodologies, Agile Project Management, Scrum, Agility, Business Planning, Lean Management

profile_positions.description:
Functions:
- Customer assistance with solid technical, communication protocols and
operations knowledge.

strengthen business lines.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
Growth team member

and strategic decisions.

in charge of courses such as: Electrical circuits II,

company.name: SPRITALL - COLOMBIA
company.description:
Fundada en el año 2013, en la ciudad de Bogotá Colombia,  SPRITALL COMPANY S.A.S. es una compañía integradora de servicios de tecnología, que dispone de múltiples soluciones para el hogar y la industria.

Somos el representante oficial de FIBARO para Colombia y asociados certificados de BOSCH y ORTRONICS.

Transformamos sus espacios en unidades inteligentes mejorando su calidad de vida, incrementando su seguridad.

Ofrecemos soluciones personalizadas, que cumplen y superan las expectativas de nuestros clientes.

Implementamos innovaciones tecnológicas de la más alta calidad, ofreciendo una experiencia única.
